pages.title: Vault Meal
pages.text: The $(#033dfc)Vault Meal$() is a consumable food item that is very nourishable, in addition to that, it seems easily digestable, making for a rapid snack.

pages.title: Obtaining
pages.text: $(#033dfc)Vault Meals$() can be obtained inside of Vaults in Vault Chests at any level.
